# c-status

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                                          | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Status type | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot             | Description |
| ---------------- | ----------- |
| `"Default slot"` | Status text |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                  | Description                     |
| ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `--c-status-background-color`         | Status default background color |
| `--c-status-error-background-color`   | Status error background color   |
| `--c-status-error-text-color`         | Status error text color         |
| `--c-status-info-background-color`    | Status info background color    |
| `--c-status-info-text-color`          | Status info background color    |
| `--c-status-success-background-color` | Status success background color |
| `--c-status-success-text-color`       | Status success text color       |
| `--c-status-warning-background-color` | Status warning background color |
| `--c-status-warning-text-color`       | Status warning text color       |
